meanings.sent1: She rehangs the painting on the wall.
meanings.sent2: After the wind knocked it down, he rehangs the wind chime.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful ghost rehangs the portrait every night.
meanings.sent4: His determination rehangs the dream of success in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The gardener carefully rehangs the bird feeder to attract more birds.

meanings.definition: To suspend or be suspended again
meanings.sent1: The worker rehangs the sign outside the store.
meanings.sent2: The flag rehangs proudly in the breeze after the storm passed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten rehangs the toy mouse on the curtain.
meanings.sent4: Hope rehangs in the air as they wait for the test results.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh bread rehangs in the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
